greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle G(n,k): the value of n written in base k with digits reversed (but written here in base 10) for 2 <= k <= n.
maple: A191780 := proc(n,k) d := ListTools[Reverse](convert(n,base,k)) ; add( op(i,d)*k^(i-1),i=1..nops(d)) ;
mathematica: G[n_, k_] := IntegerDigits[n, k] // Reverse // FromDigits[#, k]&; Table[ G[n, k], {n, 2, 15}, {k, 2, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 10 2018 *)
results.author: _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Aug 02 2011
